title: “That would be part of the message against sinning against God and fornication”
text:
When the operator asked if James, 61, was bleeding badly, Victoria coldly replied: “Oh no … I couldn’t even get enough blood to make the sign of the cross, or write sinner, or anything like that.”

Authorities haven’t revealed a motive for the maiming.

But when Victoria was asked what caused her spouse’s pain, her answer was: “That would be part of the message against sinning against God and fornication,” according to the call.

She said she’d put a towel on her husband and told him he wasn’t going to die “because you’re going to carry a message,” the outlet reported.
